author: @sharmavins23
description: This project is an ambitious attempt to create an accurate damage calculator for the video game Warframe. While other [similar calculators](https://overframe.gg) exist, I feel they are strongly lacking in a series of primary features I appreciate:
name: weapon-dps-statsim

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch public --watch src -e ts,html,css --exec "npm run build"
